byline: Karen Clark, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, David Gura, Sam Beard and Alex Gardner
teaser: Next week, the U.S. government officially changes the way it measure the economy. How does the GDP calculation work? And U.S. mortgage rates jump to their highest level since July 2011, following comments from Federal Reserve chairman Ben Bernanke.
description: Next week, the U.S. government officially changes the way it measure the economy. How does the GDP calculation work? And U.S. mortgage rates jump to their highest level since July 2011, following comments from Federal Reserve chairman Ben Bernanke.
title: Marketplace for Friday, June 28, 2013
